title: British Columbia: mountains to the sea
brief_description: A picturesque film that explores the different wild environments of British Columbia. The film records the change of the seasons and the effects that the changes have on the many species of wildlife and their habitats.
description: A picturesque film that explores the different wild environments of British Columbia. The film records the change of the seasons and the effects that the changes have on the many species of wildlife and their habitats.
